name: Paranormal Files: Fellow Traveler - Collector's Edition
storyline: Visit the mansion where the fellow traveler wanted to go, search it, uncover its grim secrets and terrible mysteries. Most importantly, don’t forget about time – you have only three days for lifting the curse. Tick-tock, the clock is ticking...
summary:
Fellow Traveler is the first episode of the hidden-object adventure puzzle game series.
Collector's Edition has bonus game, bonus collectibles and achievements, wallpapers, screensavers, concept art, strategy guide.
